alert.note: Alert for Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County; Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 3:26PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Elbert and central Lincoln Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 326 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles west of Limon to 10 miles north of Rush, or along a line extending from 41 miles west of Flagler to 37 miles east of Colorado Springs. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Limon, Genoa, Kutch, Punkin Center and Matheson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County; Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County
